about_the_game: This demo for The Charnel House Trilogy is complete middle episode of the game 'Sepulchre'.
detailed_description: This demo for The Charnel House Trilogy is complete middle episode of the game 'Sepulchre'.
name: The Charnel House Trilogy Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP 3 / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: 1 GHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB VRAM and above)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 220 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible.
